entries.waypoint_description_1: A den of squill that have enjoyed a tremendous upswing in their population due to easily available food.
entries.player_sorry: Not yet. I am still looking.
entries.player_3_1: Are squill that popular of a commodity?
entries.npc_work_1: Did you find the squills' lair?
entries.npc_reset: How could you pass up an opportunity of a lifetime like this. Something like this just doesn't fall into your lap everyday! Take intiative! Take a chance! Take my word - squill hides are the future!
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Well get out there and get to work!
entries.npc_4_1: Are they popular? Are you kidding me? Every kid from here to Coruscant wants to get their hands on a genuine squill hide jacket! You can't go wrong with squill! That's what I always say - you just can't go wrong! So, you interested or what?
entries.npc_3_1: How could you pass up an opportunity of a lifetime like this. Something like this just doesn't fall into your lap everyday! Take intiative! Take a chance! Take my word - squill hides are the future!
entries.npc_2_1: Just sign this contract here... good, and here... excellent! All you need to do is go out here and kill the little buggers! Once you have them down to a manageable level, we'll move in and take over - er - I mean... help your guide business endeavors.
entries.npc_1_1: You there! Have I got a deal for you! Have you ever been interested into going into business in the squill industry? How do I do that, you ask? Well, quite easily, I'll tell you. All you need to do is go out to these caves, kill a bunch of squill, then
